mapper.insert: insert into tab_content_comment (id, uid, cid, comment_text, reply_uid, create_time, comment_url, prient_id, root_id ) values (#{id}, #{uid}, #{cid}, #{commentText}, #{replyUid}, #{createTime}, #{commentUrl}, #{parentId}, #{rootId} )
mapper.select: select a.uid from tab_user_info a where a.role_id=4 and not EXISTS (select 1 from tab_content_comment b where b.cid=#{cid} and a.uid=b.uid)
mapper.update: update tab_content_info set comment_num=comment_num-#{num} where cid=#{cid}
mapper.sql: select c.video_url_hd videoUrlHd,c.thumbnails_url thumbnailsUrl,b.nick_name nickName,b.avatar_url avatarUrl,a.uid,a.cid, a.create_time createTime ,a.id ,a.comment_text commentText,a.root_id rootId,a.reply_uid replyUid,a.prient_id prientId from tab_content_comment a,tab_user_info b,tab_content_info c where a.cid=c.cid and a.uid=b.uid and(c.uid=#{uid} and a.is_new=1 and a.root_id=0) UNION select c.video_url_hd videoUrlHd,c.thumbnails_url thumbnailsUrl,b.nick_name nickName,b.avatar_url avatarUrl,a.uid,a.cid, a.create_time createTime ,a.id ,a.comment_text commentText,a.root_id rootId,a.reply_uid replyUid,a.prient_id prientId from tab_content_comment a,tab_user_info b,tab_content_info c where a.cid=c.cid and a.uid=b.uid and a.reply_uid=#{uid} and a.is_new=1 and a.reply_uid!=0

select c.video_url_hd videoUrlHd,c.thumbnails_url thumbnailsUrl,b.nick_name nickName,b.avatar_url avatarUrl,a.uid,a.cid ,a.create_time createTime ,a.id ,a.comment_text commentText,a.root_id rootId,a.reply_uid replyUid,a.prient_id prientId from tab_content_comment a,tab_user_info b,tab_content_info c where a.cid=c.cid and a.uid=b.uid and a.cid=#{cid} and a.is_new=1 and (a.root_id=0 or a.reply_uid=1 ) order by a.create_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from tab_content_comment where id=#{id} or root_id=#{id}
mapper.update: update tab_content_comment set is_new=0 where id=#{id}
